name: d0afc93b-dcd1-4aaa-abd3-2f0551171859
goal: Provide users with accurate and helpful information about available learning resources, sessions, workshops, and community opportunities on HerKey. Guide users to discover, access, and engage with learning content that matches their interests and career goals

steps.text: Greet the user and acknowledge their interest in learning resources.
Inform the user about the types of learning resources available on HerKey, such as sessions, workshops, and community learning opportunities.
Guide the user to the "Learning" section on HerKey for exploring sessions and resources.
If the user requests to see available sessions, direct them to the "Sessions for you" section.
If the user specifies a particular topic or skill, ask for more details and provide tailored learning resource recommendations.
If the user wants to join a group, guide them to the "Groups" section for learning-focused communities.
If the user expresses interest in mentorship or asks about mentorship opportunities, route them to ${FLOW:MENTORSHIP}.
Ask if the user needs further assistance with learning resources or other HerKey features.
If the user does not need further help, end the conversation politely.
